text: François-Théodore Savoie (February 14, 1846 - September 9, 1921) was a Canadian politician. He was elected to the House of Commons of Canada for the Quebec electoral district of Mégantic in the 1904 federal election. A Liberal, he was re-elected in 1908. In 1915, he was appointed to the Legislative Council of Quebec for the Kennebec Division. He died while in office in 1921. ==References== * * Category:1846 births Category:1921 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Canada MPs Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Quebec Category:Quebec Liberal Party MLCs
title: François-Théodore Savoie
